name: Wizard Works
tag_list: mobile, cross-device, cloud, sync, personal, daily-life, ict
overview:
Wizard Works is a group of people who believe in ‘Technology to People’. Since the establishment of the company in 2006, Wizard Works has been pushing the boundaries by bringing the benefit of information & communication technology to people across the board. Its personalised web portal service ‘wzd.com’ (2006) introduced the notion of Web 2.0 to Korea, and widget platform ‘Wizard Factory” provided services to 17 million bloggers.

In 2012 the company has taken up yet another challenge to democratise Cloud Synchronisation technology by introducing ‘SomCloud’, a cross-device cloud productivity app brand. SomCloud currently includes two mobile apps: SomNote (a note-taking app) and SomTodo (a task-management app). By allowing users to take full advantage of cloud technology without having to know the technology behind, Wizard Works aims to make it the most intuitive and easy-to-use Cloud productivity service on Earth.

offices.address1: #1107 R&D Center, Nuritkum Square, 396 Worldcup Buk-ro, Mapo-gu
